entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Windows BackupProxies migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 22, 06:00 UTC  -  Apr 26, 12:00 UTC

Apr 12, 21:36 UTC

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS][VMware] - Management console
entry.content:
Apr 5, 15:28 UTC
Resolved - Start time: 05/04/2024 13:42 UTC
End time: 05/04/2024 15:22 UTC
User impact : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.

Apr 5, 14:58 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Apr 5, 14:57 UTC
Investigating - Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 05/04/2024 13:42 UTC
User impact : Customers do not have access to their management console.
However access on their VMs remain accessible .
Ongoing Actions:Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - PCC Malfunction
entry.content:
Apr 2, 17:58 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 02/04/2024 14:16 UTC
End Time : 02/04/2024 17:51 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 2, 17:29 UTC
Update - The incident has been resolved for almost all customers, and our teams are actively working on the few remaining customers.

Apr 2, 15:53 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Apr 2, 15:45 UTC
Investigating - Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 02/04/2024 14:16 UTC
User impact : Due to a technical incident, access to some PCC infrastructure is currently unavailable. The incident has been fixed and access is being restored
No data has been lost. The configuration of impacted PCCs has not been altered.
Ongoing Actions:Our team is investigating the issue.

entry.content:
Mar 26, 09:57 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
